Package com.nexmo.sdk.verify.core.service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseService<T extends BaseResponse>
    Wrapper class used for constructing and sending Http requests to Nexmo services.
    CheckService
    Service that checks whether the PIN code received from your end user matches the one Nexmo has sent.
    CommandService
    Command service that triggers actions for a user.
    SearchService
    Service that checks the current state of the user, without initiating any verification triggered in the background.
    TokenService
    Service that triggers a new token request against the SDK Service.
    VerifyService
    Verification Service that enables you to request Nexmo to kick off the verification process for the number you/the user has provided.
